Question.Subject: Is it possible to change the email of the Skype account?
Question.Content: Or do I have to create a new Skype account?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Here's what you need to do: 1) Log on Skype 2) Go to Skype - Account 3) You get a pop-up page. In the bottom left corner you see your registered email. 4) Click on email settings, proceed as instructed.
NB: if you do not know your password and have no access to your registered email address and have no purchase history you will have to create a new account, as customer support will have no means to verify your identity. But if you know your password, you can change your email address fairly easily.
